Response.Say: You sneak up to the rock and listen carefully. It sounds like a variant of I Kissed a Girl. What does that tell you about this mysterious banjo player?
They're a law-abiding, tax-paying, library-card-carrying citizen that you would trust as a babysitter. You whip out your harmonica and start that duet you were thinking about.
SCARY SCARY RUN RUN! What sort of freak likes I Kissed a Girl?!
They have terrible taste in music and don't deserve to continue playing. You need to confiscate the ill-treated instrument immediately.
